summary: This document is a letter from Jeffrey Epstein authorizing the transfer of funds from his Jeepers, Inc account to Deutsche Bank. The letter includes specific banking instructions and account details.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the individual authorizing the transfer of funds from his account.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein authorized the transfer of funds from his Jeepers, Inc account.
The transfer is directed to Deutsche Bank.
Specific banking details are provided in the letter.
